co.uk.genonline.simpleweb.web.gallery

Interface GalleryHtmlGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GalleryCarouselHtmlGenerator, GalleryHtml

    public interface GalleryHtmlGenerator
    Defines interface to be used for classes which generate the HTML to drive a gallery. Allows generation of different gallery styles transparently. Inputs: - URL (not path) for image folder - URL for thumbnail folder - List of image names
